name: Plant of DOOM
description:
Controls

up, down, left, right: W, A, S, D, or arrows

A: J, space

Start: Enter

How to play

Press up and down to walk forvardand backward

Use left, right to look around

Press A to enter, unlock, open

Press start to view menu

All doors in game are locked and must be unlocked using key.

Doors with letter S on them are allways unlocked and leads to shop.

This is just demo, there are only 4 levels in total. 

Let me know if you like to see full game.

Enjoy :)
